title: Tokyo Marui AK-47 GBBR
description: Excellent condition Tokyo Marui AK-47 Gas Blowback Rifle. Includes 3 magazines, cleaning kit, and original box. Perfect for milsim events.

title: Complete Tactical Gear Set
description: Full tactical setup including plate carrier, helmet, knee pads, and gloves. Used only twice, like new condition. Perfect for beginners.

title: Krytac Trident MK2 CRB
description: Krytac Trident MK2 CRB in excellent condition. Upgraded with tight bore barrel and hop-up. Shoots consistently at 400 FPS.

title: WE Glock 17 GBB Pistol
description: WE Glock 17 Gas Blowback Pistol with 2 magazines. Great sidearm for any loadout. Minor wear on slide, functions perfectly.

title: Scope and Optics Bundle
description: Bundle includes red dot sight, 3-9x scope, and flip-up iron sights. All in working condition, perfect for upgrading your setup.

title: Multicam Uniform Set
description: Authentic multicam BDU set, size Large. Includes combat shirt and pants. Lightly used, no tears or stains. Great for outdoor games.
